ygData.subject: Very Happy

::KitKat::

She woke up and went to her sink.  She turned on the water and 
splashed a little cold water on her face.  She smiled at her 
reflection in the mirror. Who knew how wonderful love could be, she 
thought. She turned around and saw Drillbit still asleep. She sighed 
and smiled. She walked over and kissed him on the lips.  She decided 
to leave him sleeping and very quietly walked out of her room.  she 
quietly shut the door behind her and walked out into the main room.  
She went over to the console.  She saw Wildfire and Megatron talking. 
Wildfire looked hysterical.  She walked over to Wildfire and Megatron.
"What's wrong? What's going on?"
